summary: The story of an intersexual fifteen-year-old. She lives with her parents, who have to cope with the challenges of her medical condition.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Valeria Bertuccelli|Germán Palacios|Carolina Pelleritti|Martín Piroyansky|Inés Efron|Guillermo Angelelli|César Troncoso|Jean Pierre Reguerraz|Ailín Salas|Luciano Nóbile|Lucas Escariz
title: XXY
